title:
Screenshot SWTBot can automatically generate screenshots of the running application if a test fails. To use this feature include the plug-in _org.eclipse.swtbot.junit4_x_ into the dependencies of your test project. Annotate your class test with `@RunWith(SWTBotJunit4ClassRunner.class)`. This will automatically generated screenshots in the screenshots folder or your test projects. If you do not see this folder in your project, try refreshing the project (F5).
You can trigger a screenshot in your code via the method `bot.captureScreenshot(fileName)`.
